item.title: CVE-2018-0578|2024-08-05T03:28:11.128Z -- minimal%20work%20srl -- pixelyoursite
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in PixelYourSite plugin prior to version 5.3.0 for WordPress allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.
